short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your website more engaging! A specially designed colorizing plugin to bring your articles to life. Try it for free.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your web content stand out with the Highlighting Plugin! This plugin allows users to easily highlight and change the color of text on any webpage. Plus, it includes a sidebar that lists all of the highlighted text for quick access. By using this plugin, your readers can quickly find important information and enhance their reading experience. Installing this plugin can help improve your website's readability, emphasize crucial information, and keep readers engaged. Improve your website's user experience with the Highlighting Plugin!
